zh.my_case_one_content_one: 我一直在寻找在保有我数字货币的同时，能够获得资金流动性的方法。
zh.my_case_one_content_two: 很显然‘coin&cash’帮助我解决了这一难题。
zh.my_case_one_content_three: 对于像我这样的长期投资者来说，我需要持有大量的数字资产以防止法币的贬值并寻求投资收益，但是与此同时，
zh.my_case_one_content_four: 我也需要一笔法币资金用于日常生活开销。
zh.my_case_one_content_five: ‘coin&cash’给我带来了稳定的商业贷款数额，并使我在偿还贷款后，抵押品市值已经增长了很多倍。
zh.my_case_one_content_six: 我会继续使用和支持‘coin&cash’，期待平台能够获得更巨大的成长。
zh.my_case_two_content_one: 我是一家矿场的老板，持有大量的数字资产，
zh.my_case_two_content_two: 但是其实每个月我都需要一笔资金用于购买设备、构建厂房、扩大矿场规模、提升算力等等。
zh.my_case_two_content_three: 从前，我可能会卖掉数字资产并接受法定货币的金额，
zh.my_case_two_content_four: 但是这其实失去了对于数字货币投资的意义。
zh.my_case_two_content_five: 直到'coin&cash'的出现，每次我都可以使用ETH或ETC作为抵押，
zh.my_case_two_content_six: 来获得相应比例的贷款融资，以稳定的货币商定的贷款数额，用于购买设备，扩大生产规模。
zh.my_case_three_content_one: 'coin&cash'帮助我实现了资产价值的多倍提升。
zh.my_case_three_content_two: 我是一名资深的数字货币投资者，
zh.my_case_three_content_three: 我看好数字货币的世界所能给我带来的巨额收益，
zh.my_case_three_content_five: 他帮助我在持有数字货币的同时能够获得生活所需的资金。
zh.my_case_three_content_six: 为了追求投资利益的最大化，我会继续关注并支持“coin&cash”。

en.my_case_one_content_one: I have been looking for ways to get liquidity while keeping my digital currency.
en.my_case_one_content_two: Obviously ‘coin&cash’ helped me solve this problem.
en.my_case_one_content_three: For long-term investors like me, I need to hold a lot of digital assets to prevent the depreciation of fiat currency and seek investment return, but at the same time,
en.my_case_one_content_four: I also need fiat money to cover daily cost
en.my_case_one_content_five: Coin&cash’ has brought me a steady amount of commercial loans and the market value of my collaterals has been upped many times when I repaid the loan.
en.my_case_one_content_six: I will continue to use and support ‘coin&cash’ and expect the platform to grow even bigger.
en.my_case_two_content_one: I am the owner of a mine and hold a lot of digital assets.
en.my_case_two_content_two: But in fact, every month I need a sum of money to buy equipment, build factories, expand mines, increase hashrate, and so on.
en.my_case_two_content_three: In the past, I might sell digital assets and accept the amount of fiat money
en.my_case_two_content_four: But this actually lost the meaning of investing in digital currency.
en.my_case_two_content_five: The launch of 'coin&cash' enabled me to use ETH or ETC as a mortgage every time.
en.my_case_two_content_six: To obtain the corresponding proportion of loan, the amount of loans agreed in a stable currency, used to purchase equipment and expand production scale.
en.my_case_three_content_one: Coin&cash' helped increase the value of my assets multiple times.
en.my_case_three_content_three: I am optimistic about the huge benefits that the world of digital currency can bring to me,
en.my_case_three_content_five: He helped me get the money I need to live while holding my digital currency.
en.my_case_three_content_six: In order to maximize the benefits of investment, I will continue to follow and support coin&cash.
